DOC.brief_summary: This data base has been set in order to gather oncogeriatric information from elderly patients with pancreatic cancer who underwent an oncogeriatric evaluation. ONCOGEPAN database gathers data from deux institutions (Institut Paoli-Calmettes and Assistance Publique des HÃ´pitaux de Marseille) involved in Marseille SIRIC (Integrated Cancer Research Site).
DOC.brief_title: Onco-geriatric Database of Patients With Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Age>70 years Oncogeriatric evaluation done Patient refusal to participate in the study
